qas.question: How much did Ted Turner pay for Metro-Goldwyn Mayer?
In what year did Ted Turner buy Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer?
Who did Ted Turner sell Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer to?
Who did Ted Turner buy Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer from?
Up to what date of release did Turner retain ownership of the MGM film library?
How much did Ted Turner pay for UA?
In what year did Ted Turner buy UA?
Who did Ted Turner sell UA to?
Who did Ted Turner buy UA from?
Up to what date of release did Kerkorian retain ownership of the MGM film library?

context: In <a1_0><b6_0>1986<b6_0/><a1_0/>, eight years before the launch of Turner Classic Movies, Ted Turner acquired the Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer film studio for <a0_0><b5_0>$1.5 billion<b5_0/><a0_0/>. Concerns over Turner Entertainment's corporate debt load resulted in Turner selling the studio that October back to <a2_0><a3_0><b7_0><b8_0>Kirk Kerkorian<b8_0/><b7_0/><a3_0/><a2_0/>, from whom Turner had purchased the studio less than a year before. As part of the deal, Turner Entertainment retained ownership of MGM's library of films released up to <a4_0><b9_0>May 9, 1986<b9_0/><a4_0/>. Turner Broadcasting System was split into two companies; Turner Broadcasting System and Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer and reincorporated as MGM/UA Communications Co.
